item.title: Interesting Reads - 2024-11-11~2024-11-17
item.description: Notable reads for 11-11 - 11-17 I Can’t Believe Marvel Is Ending Its Most Ambitious MCU Show In Its Best Moment ![marvel]({{ site.baseurl }}assets/images/captain-carter-and-storm-variant_df14c24e5be54ad1ab76055faf508c5c.jpg) Entertainment Marvel Animation’s What If…? Season 3 - Official Trailer - Disney Cocteau Twins’ gauzy, gothy ‘Treasure’ turns 40 The White Stripes dismiss copyright lawsuit against Trump over ‘Seven Nation Army’ “That’s going to be very different in the books”: George RR Martin Never Wanted a Controversial Littlefinger Storyline to Happen in Game of Thrones Technology How to use Google Chrome’s Tab Compare feature The death of the internet: why the future is terrifying, and how we fix it Using a dual-screen portable monitor for a month - Ars Technica News russia-rise of powerful darknet drug industry dead drops punishment beatings The Guardian: Propaganda: 100 years of fear, manipulation and persuasion – in pictures Maher blasts left ‘doubling down’ on what ‘f—ed’ them in election: ‘Take one week to ask what you did wrong’ BBC.

item.title: Interesting Reads - 2024-11-17~2024-11-24
item.description: Tech Say Goodbye to Your IDE: Meet LazyVim ChatGPT was tasked with designing a website. The result was as manipulative as you’d expect - Fast Company The shape of a photon, particle of light: “something that hasn’t been seen before in physics” Aider Composer : This VS Code Extension BEATS Cursor! Sports ESPN Show Calls This Pro Duck “The Best Player in Pro Football” Detroit Tigers Reportedly ‘Didn’t Come Close’ To Extending Their Superstar Young Americans are losing faith in college and turning to skilled trades — here’s why the ‘toolbelt generation’ is taking a pass on degrees and student debt News Metro Times photog Doug Coombe shows generations of Detroit icons at Ann Arbor Art Center ‘Morning Joe’ Hosts Joe Scarborough And Mika Brzezinski Say They Met With Donald Trump In “Restart” Of Communications
